List Style Type

# List Style Type

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
list-none
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
list-disc
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
list-decimal
``` | ✅ Full Support |
